checks.name: Maintained

checks.name: Code-Review
checks.reason: 3 out of last 30 changesets reviewed before merge -- score normalized to 1

documentation.short: Determines if the project requires code review before pull requests (aka merge requests) are merged.
Determines if the project has an OpenSSF (formerly CII) Best Practices Badge.
Determines if the project has open, known unfixed vulnerabilities.
Determines if the project cryptographically signs release artifacts.

checks.reason: branch protection is not maximal on development and all release branches

Warn: number of required reviewers is only 1 on branch 'develop'
Warn: codeowner review is not required on branch 'develop'

checks.name: Packaging
details: Warn: no GitHub publishing workflow detected

documentation.short: Determines if the project is published as a package that others can easily download, install, easily update, and uninstall.
Determines if the project's GitHub Action workflows avoid dangerous patterns.
Determines if the project has defined a license.

checks.name: Token-Permissions
checks.reason: tokens are read-only in GitHub workflows

documentation.short: Determines if the project's workflows follow the principle of least privilege.
